item.title: 4 people and 5 months in space, NASA's Crew-10 mission safely returns to Earth
item.description: It took the capsule 17 hours to make the trip home, experiencing re-entry temperatures of around 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit as it punched through the atmosphere following Friday's ISS undocking.

item.title: Authorities ID suspect in CDC shooting as a 30-year-old man from suburban Atlanta

item.title: Opinion: Remembering Sandra Grimes, mole hunter
item.description: Sandra Grimes died at the age of 79. Her work was crucial in catching a Soviet agent who "caused more damage to the national security of the United States than any spy in the history of the CIA."

item.title: Blame it on the moon. This year's Perseids meteors won't be as visible at their peak
item.description: The Perseids meteor shower is the most popular one of the year. The meteors during this time are characterized by bright fireballs and long "wakes," the streak of light and color that follow behind.

item.title: 'At least I'm safe': A Kenyan immigrant opts to leave the U.S. on his own terms
item.description: The Trump administration has given an ultimatum to immigrants without legal status: Leave voluntarily, or you'll be detained and deported. This has forced some immigrant families in the U.S. to grapple with very hard choices.
